items.sentence: Tom was able to fit everything he owned into one suitcase.
Tom was about to say something when Mary entered the room.
Tom was afraid of what might happen to him and his family.
Tom was dead before the ambulance arrived at the hospital.
She doesn\'t want him to buy an expensive engagement ring.
She helped him tie his tie because he didn\'t know how to.
Tom\'s parents both died while he was still a small child.
Tom waited a while to let his eyes adjust to the darkness.
Tom was a bit surprised when he saw Mary and John kissing.
Tom was shocked to hear that Mary had gotten into Harvard.
